To use shopping list, please log into account:
Unable to log in. Please check your user credentials and internet connection.

Error loading categories, please try again..
Continue without logging in (without shoplists, you will only be able to view items) >
Are you sure you want to log out?
Welcome to gcSales! You are currently not logged in, so you can only view shops\' items. For shopping lists functionality, please register :)
Here will your shopping lists. Just hit log in and then register!
gcSales is an application where you view items from local grocery stores, add them to shoplists and share account with your family. In order to use shoplists, you need to register.

gcSales was developed under support of HSE (Higher School of Economics, Moscow). Developers: Kupriyanov Kirill (github: Sinopsys) Surovtsev Maxim (github: diwww) Contact: contact@gcsales.ru Website: www.gcsales.ru have a good day!

You have the following functionality: 1. View items for each store we have in our database. 2. Choose which category to view. 3. When you register, you will be able to add items to shopping lists and create them. 4. Edit shopping lists: add and remove items from it. 5. If there is no such item in the store, just add it directly from shoplist and it will be added as a text item. As soon as it is to appear in the shop, it will become an item, containing other items. You can add them as well! Just long click on them. 6. You can view help and about sections.
